DOC.brief_summary: This quantitative study aim evaluate respiratory muscle strength , pulmonary function , cardiovascular function , impact quality life patient cardiac rehabilitation associate diaphragmatic muscle training .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Cardiomyopathies functional class III IV ( New York Heart Association ) Aged 18 year Body mass index 30 kg/m2 Confused depressed patient Cardiac instability worsen dyspnea initiation treatment
